title: S&C Electric Company announces new interoperable control solution at DTECH
description: At DTECH 2026 in San Diego, S&C Electric Company announced a collaboration with Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories on the SEL-651RD Advanced Digital Control.
content: At DTECH 2026 in San Diego, S&C Electric Company announced a collaboration with Schweitzer Engineering Laboratories on the SEL-651RD Advanced Digital Control.
